description: Enterprise-grade Application Performance Monitoring dashboard with comprehensive metrics for request rates, latency, errors, throughput, and business KPIs

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(app_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{application="$application", environment="$environment", team="$team", method=~"$method"}[5m])) by (le, instance))

rate(app_http_request_duration_seconds_sum{application="$application", environment="$environment", team="$team", method=~"$method"}[5m]) / rate(app_http_request_duration_seconds_count{application="$application", environment="$environment", team="$team", method=~"$method"}[5m])
topk(15, histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(app_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{application="$application", environment="$environment", team="$team", endpoint!=""}[5m])) by (le, endpoint)))

topk(15, sum(rate(app_http_requests_total{application="$application", environment="$environment", team="$team", endpoint!="", status=~"5.."}[5m])) by (endpoint) / sum(rate(app_http_requests_total{application="$application", environment="$environment", team="$team", endpoint!=""}[5m])) by (endpoint))

title: Application Performance Monitoring
